title: The Circle fans say it's 'obvious' Beth was a catfish as she gets blocked from show
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Tonight's episode of The Circle saw Beth and Jack get blocked as they went undercover as "Joyce".

It sent fans into uproar as they say it was "obvious" that Beth was a catfish, and some can't believe she was "surprised" that they got found out.

The pair were playing together as 62-year-old Joyce before they were eliminated.

Their exit from the show follows a twist that viewers get the chance to make one of them a secret influencer - and Woody was the chosen one.

One fan of the show wrote: "Can't believe Beth is actually surprised that it was obvious that they were a catfish #TheCircle "

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

While another stated: "Beth is fuming she really thought they’d been doing well and is so surprised Woody was suspicious of ‘Joyce’ #TheCircle "

A third penned: "Beth was such a dramatic b***h when Woody arrived, no-one else has ever reacted that. Between that and the comment about her profile stopping people from liking her....... maybe looks aren't the problem"

While another simply wrote that Beth was "fuming".

(Image: Channel 4)

In a game where anyone can be anyone, players of the show live in the same building but reside in completely different apartments.

But the players never meet face to face and communicate only via social media platform The Circle in a bid to be voted the most popular by other contestants.

(Image: Channel 4)

Beth and Jack were previously eliminated, but were voted back in by the public to play together as a new player.

*The final of The Circle takes place this Friday on Channel 4 at 10pm.
description: Contestants Beth and Jack got blocked from tonight's show in the final week as the £100,000 prize is still up for grabs
